DOC.brief_summary: This study is designed to assess the impact of 13-valent Pneumococcal Conjugate Vaccine (13vPnC) on nasopharyngeal colonization with Streptococcus pneumoniae in healthy infants.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating the Impact of a 13-valent Pneumococcal Conjugate Vaccine on Nasopharyngeal Colonization
DOC.criteria: Healthy infants aged 2 months (4298 days) at time of enrolment. Available for the entire study period and whose parent/legal guardian can be reached by telephone. Previous vaccination with licensed or investigational pneumococcal vaccine. A previous anaphylactic reaction to any vaccine or vaccinerelated component. Contraindication to vaccination with a pneumococcal conjugate vaccine.
